import React, {useState} from "react"; import { Form, Col, Row, FormGroup, Label, Button, ModalBody, ModalFooter, Input, Modal, ModalHeader, CustomInput } from "reactstrap"; import Translate from "../../../../Translate"; import TabComponent from "./tab/productTab"; import photo6 from "../../../../assets/images/empty_product.svg"; import LocalizeTab from "../../../localize/localizeTab"; const ProductModal = (props) => { const [img, setImg] = useState(false) function modalBodyContent() { if (props.type === "delete") { return ( Դուք համոզված ե՞ք ջնջել ) } else { console.log('img',img) return (
{ setImg(event.target.files[0]) props.uploadImages("products", event); props.setModalValues("images", event.target.value) }} /> props.setModalValues("sku", event.target.value)} /> props.setModalValues("name", event.target.value)} /> props.setModalValues("active", props.product.hasOwnProperty('active') ? (!props.product.active) : false)} />
) } } return ( props.toggleModal(props.type)} size="lg"> props.toggleModal(props.type)}> {modalBodyContent()} ); }; export default ProductModal;
